description: My fellow citizens, my namaskar to all of you! 26th January, our Republic Day was celebrated with joy and enthusiasm in every nook and corner of the nation by all of us. The Constitution of India, the duties of citizens, the rights of citizens and our commitment to democracy - these in a way make Re...
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Greetings on World Radio Day. I congratulate all radio lovers and those who work in the radio industry & keep the medium active & vibrant. Radio is a wonderful way to interact, learn & communicate. My own #MannKiBaat experience has connected me with people across India.

All #MannKiBaat episodes can be heard here. http://www.narendramodi.in/mann-ki-baat
